channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenRefine -- OpenRefine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenRefine -- OpenRefine

item.title: CVE-2023-41887|2024-09-25T18:55:03.906Z -- openrefine -- openrefine
item.description: OpenRefine is a powerful free, open source tool for working with messy data. Prior to version 3.7.5, a remote code execution vulnerability allows any unauthenticated user to execute code on the server. Version 3.7.5 has a patch for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-41886|2024-09-25T18:48:19.859Z -- openrefine -- openrefine
item.description: OpenRefine is a powerful free, open source tool for working with messy data. Prior to version 3.7.5, an arbitrary file read vulnerability allows any unauthenticated user to read a file on a server. Version 3.7.5 fixes this issue.
